title: Hand-drawn looking flyer font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080628195219im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rb_big_3509.jpg)

Anybody know?

 [‹ Need to know this font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080628195219/http:/typophile.com/node/46864 "Go to previous forum topic") [type Id help ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080628195219/http:/typophile.com/node/46861 "Go to next forum topic")
author: franckruk

comments.content: Maybe it was handdrawn. I frequently will make an aphabet handdrawn, scan it in, and livetrace, or just save the scan for further use one day. It means having to set the type yourself, lining it up and everything, but maybe that’s what this person is doing. Other than that, it reminds me of school house rock.
